entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 08:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

Temperature: 2.0°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 71 %

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to periods of ice pellets mixed with light snow near midnight then to light snow before morning. Risk of freezing rain this evening and after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
